settings.title: Where do you source your flowers from?
settings.text: We source our flowers from the best suppliers in UAE who in turn source the flowers directly from growers in countries like Netherlands, Ecuador, Colombia, Kenya and India.

settings.title: Do I need to have an account with Zuvees to place an order?
settings.text: Having a Zuvees account is not required to place an order. However, having an account help in saving addresses and you get access to exclusive gifts & deals.

settings.title: How do I get in touch with you?
settings.text: You can mail us at hi@zuvees.com OR call/ whatsapp us at +971 55 417 2570

settings.title: What are your business hours?
settings.text: We are available 7 days a week, 11 AM to 12 mid-night.

settings.title: Do you call the recipient before delivery?
settings.text: We like to keep the surprise as-is :) However, we might contact the recipient if there are issues with address/ directions.

settings.title: I want to make changes to my order?
settings.text:
You can cancel or change your order by emailing hi@zuvees.com at least 48 hours before the requested delivery date.
Please refer to our detailed return & refund policy.

settings.title: I want a refund for my order
settings.text: If you're not happy with our service, we want to hear about it! Please contact us within 1 business day of delivery to allow for a swift resolution. Please refer to our detailed return & refund policy.

settings.title: How do you make sure that what I see on your website is what is delivered?
settings.text: For all orders placed on our website “Zuvees.ae”, we give an option for customers to do video approval of the order before it is sent to the recipient.

settings.heading: Can't find what you're looking for?

settings.text:
Send us an email to tell us what's up and someone from our Customer Service team will get back to you as soon as possible. Be sure to include your order number (if you have one).

Please email us at hi@zuvees.com or WhatsApp us at +971 55 417 2570
Please email us at hi@zuvees.com or WhatsApp us at +971 55 417 2570
